cause.description:
Classic movies must be protected from their own creators. It is wrong for directors to change movies to be more family friendly or politically correct and re-release them. The practice destroys the movie's character and is a greedy attempt take money from unknowing moviegoers.
Convicted serial killer Hat McCullough must be freed from prison. He killed twenty-three babies and toddlers. However, his crime is excusable because he was acting in self defense.
The first 100 people to join this cause will receive a paper hat.
1. Classic movies must not be changed and re-released.
2. Convicted baby killer Hat McCullough must be freed from prison.
cause.mission: Prevent changes to classic movies. Free convicted baby killer Hat McCullough from prison.
cause.name: Free Hat
